solution_line_template: Jerome ate {jerome_factor} times the amount of Jackson's {jackson_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls, so {jerome_factor}*{jackson_pizza_rolls} = <<{jerome_factor}*{jackson_pizza_rolls}={jerome_pizza_rolls}>>{jerome_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls

Tyler ate {tyler_factor} times more than Jerome's {jerome_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls, so Tyler ate {tyler_factor}*{jerome_pizza_rolls} = <<{tyler_factor}*{jerome_pizza_rolls}={tyler_pizza_rolls}>>{tyler_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls

Tyler ate {tyler_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls and Jackson only ate {jackson_pizza_rolls} pizza rolls so Tyler ate {tyler_pizza_rolls}-{jackson_pizza_rolls} = <<{tyler_pizza_rolls}-{jackson_pizza_rolls}={difference_tyler_jackson}>>{difference_tyler_jackson} more pizza rolls
